price: Guyyaa isaan hundi mul'atan, isaanirraa homaatuu Rabbi irraa hin dhokatu. “Har’a mootummaan kan eenyuuti? Kan Rabbii tokkicha, hunda injifataa ta’eeti.” (jedhama).
arabic: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yawma hum bārizūna lā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min'hum shayon limani al-mul'ku al-yawma lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
